name: Incorrect username or password in login
scenarioId: login:Incorrect username or password in login
methodName: Incorrect username or password in login

testSteps.description: 1: Incorrect username or password in login ({username=juliotester1, password=1234567890, error=User does not exist.})

children.description:
When I send the user credentials
| username | password |
| juliotester1 | 1234567890 |
User executes a POST on the resource /login

children.description:

| codeResponse | error |
| 200 | User does not exist. |
The body response has the correct error message
